relations.head: p70 S6 kinase
relations.label: phosphorylate
relations.text: p70 S6 kinase (regulated via mTOR) and p90(RSK1) (activated by Erk), phosphorylate eEF2k at a conserved serine and inhibit its activity.

relations.head: p90(RSK1)
relations.label: phosphorylate
relations.text: p70 S6 kinase (regulated via mTOR) and p90(RSK1) (activated by Erk), phosphorylate eEF2k at a conserved serine and inhibit its activity.

relations.head: elongation factor 2 kinase
relations.label: phosphorylate
relations.text: Elongation factor 2 kinase (eEF2k) phosphorylates and inactivates eEF2.

relations.head: insulin
relations.label: inactivate
relations.text: Insulin induces dephosphorylation of eEF2 and inactivation of eEF2 kinase.

relations.head: rapamycin
relations.label: inhibit
relations.text: These effects are blocked by rapamycin, which inhibits the mammalian target of rapamycin, mTOR.

relations.head: phosphoinositide-dependent kinase 1
relations.label: activate
relations.text: PDK1 is required for activation of members of the AGC kinase family.

relations.head: phosphoinositide-dependent kinase 1
relations.label: activate
relations.text: PDK1 is required for activation of members of the AGC kinase family.

relations.head: insulin-like growth factor 1
relations.label: activate
relations.text: In response to insulin-like growth factor 1, which activates p70 S6 kinase but not Erk, regulation of eEF2 is blocked by rapamycin.
